ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime soda (such as SpriteÂ®)
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Mexican beer
des: "It's called riverbank margaritas because you can carry everything you need to the riverbank! Very tasty! You can have it on the rocks or we sometimes put it in resealable bags in the freezer and it becomes slushy."
ins: Mix limeade, tequila, lemon-lime soda, and beer together in a pitcher.
